content: पिंडित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पिंड्-क्त] {@--1@} Pressed or rolled into a ball or lump. {@--2@} Thick. lumpish. {@--3@} Heaped together, collected: एष पिंडितार्थः <ls>M. 1</ls> ‘this is the meaning on the whole’. {@--4@} Mixed with. {@--5@} Added, multi plied. {@--6@} Counted, numbered. --तः Incense.
